Classes in edu.ucla.sspace.basis used by edu.ucla.sspace.basis
AbstractBasisMapping
          An abstract base class for BasisMappings that implements most of the required functionality.
BasisMapping
          An interface for specifying how a set of features can be mapped to a vector basis.
